        <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    var blcLocationUtils = new WPBlockLocationUtils();

    if (current.operation() == "update") {
        // Stopping execution if BR is called because of change in progress_state
        if (current.progress_state != previous.progress_state)
            return;

        // Checking if flow is running in background
        var isFlowRunning = current.progress_state == WPConstants.BLC_LOC_STATE.IN_PROGRESS || blcLocationUtils.isInProgress(current);
        if (isFlowRunning) {
            var errorMessage = gs.getMessage('The block location request is still under process. Please wait until the job is finished.');
            gs.addErrorMessage(errorMessage);
            current.setAbortAction(true);
            return;
        }
    }

    if (!current.active) {
        if (current.operation() != "insert")
            gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('The cancellation process of all the blocking reservations of the updated record is running in the background.'));
    } else {
        // Location and Date validation
        var response = blcLocationUtils.checkIfLocationCanBeBlocked(current);
        var abort = false;
        if (!gs.nil(response.invalidLocationMessage))
            abort = displayError(response.invalidLocationMessage);

        if (!gs.nil(response.invalidDateMessage))
            abort = displayError(response.invalidDateMessage);

        if (abort) {
            current.setAbortAction(true);
            return;
        }

        // Check if location is already blocked
        var isLocationBlocked = blcLocationUtils.checkForBlockLocationCollison(current);
        if (isLocationBlocked) {
            var collisonMessage = gs.getMessage('The {0} location or its parent location is already blocked for the selected period.', [current.location.title]);
            gs.addErrorMessage(collisonMessage);
            current.setAbortAction(true);
            return;
        }

        if (gs.nil(current.opened_by))
            current.opened_by = gs.getUserID();
        gs.addInfoMessage(gs.getMessage('The cancellation process of all the reservations for {0} for the selected blocked period is running in the background.', [current.location.title]));
    }


    function displayError(msg) {
        gs.addErrorMessage(msg);
        return true;
    }
})(current, previous);]]></script>
